metadata.title: CVE-2022-47016 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason:This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA. Further investigation showed thatit was not a security issue. Notes: none.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tmux - 2.6-3ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tmux package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6-3ubuntu0.3').
